original_body_lines: A total of 986 more suspects have been arrested by the security forces personnel within a 24-hour window ending at 12.30 a.m. today (20 Jan.) as part of the ongoing countrywide anti-drug operation ‘Yukthiya’.
According to the Ministry of Public Security, a total of 586g of heroin, 180g of crystal methamphetamine (Ice), and 44 narcotic pills.
